Godbless Always!

Can't upload sfex3 to dvd build crashes games.

some ps2 cd games cannot be rebuilt to dvd.

you can find the cd version here just search for it.

Dude, thanks for the upload. I've been looking for a good fishing game for PS2 for some time now. I say it was worth the wait.

Great game. Stunning graphics. Great gameplay.
